mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CHAT_LIST WHERE CHAT_LIST_BOARD_NO= #{chat_list_board_no} AND CHAT_LIST_BOARD_TYPE = 'S'
SELECT * FROM CHAT_LIST WHERE CHAT_LIST_BOARD_NO= #{chat_list_board_no} AND CHAT_LIST_BOARD_TYPE = 'Q'

SELECT A.CHAT_LIST_NO,A.CHAT_LIST_TITLE,A.CHAT_LIST_BOARD_TYPE,C.CHAT_MSG_TXT,A.CHAT_LIST_CREATED_AT,F.* FROM CHAT_LIST A, (SELECT F.CHAT_LIST_NO,F.CHAT_LIST_TITLE,G.CHAT_USER_ID FROM CHAT_LIST F,CHAT_USER G WHERE F.CHAT_LIST_NO = G.CHAT_USER_CHAT_NO AND G.CHAT_USER_ID=#{chat_user_id}) B, (SELECT D.CHAT_MSG_TXT,E.* FROM CHAT_MSG D, (SELECT MAX(CHAT_MSG_NO) "MAXNO",CHAT_MSG_CHAT_NO FROM CHAT_MSG GROUP BY CHAT_MSG_CHAT_NO) E WHERE D.CHAT_MSG_NO =E."MAXNO") C, (SELECT CHAT_USER_CHAT_NO,COUNT(CHAT_USER_ID) "COUNTMEMBER" FROM CHAT_USER GROUP BY CHAT_USER_CHAT_NO) F WHERE A.CHAT_LIST_NO=C.CHAT_MSG_CHAT_NO AND A.CHAT_LIST_NO = B.CHAT_LIST_NO AND A.CHAT_LIST_NO=F.CHAT_USER_CHAT_NO ORDER BY A.CHAT_LIST_CREATED_AT DESC

SELECT A.CHAT_LIST_NO,A.CHAT_LIST_TITLE,A.CHAT_LIST_BOARD_TYPE,C.CHAT_MSG_TXT,A.CHAT_LIST_CREATED_AT,F.* FROM CHAT_LIST A, (SELECT F.CHAT_LIST_NO,F.CHAT_LIST_TITLE,G.CHAT_USER_ID FROM CHAT_LIST F,CHAT_USER G WHERE F.CHAT_LIST_NO = G.CHAT_USER_CHAT_NO AND G.CHAT_USER_ID=#{chat_user_id}) B, (SELECT D.CHAT_MSG_TXT,E.* FROM CHAT_MSG D, (SELECT MAX(CHAT_MSG_NO) "MAXNO",CHAT_MSG_CHAT_NO FROM CHAT_MSG GROUP BY CHAT_MSG_CHAT_NO) E WHERE D.CHAT_MSG_NO =E."MAXNO") C, (SELECT CHAT_USER_CHAT_NO,COUNT(CHAT_USER_ID) "COUNTMEMBER" FROM CHAT_USER GROUP BY CHAT_USER_CHAT_NO) F WHERE A.CHAT_LIST_NO=C.CHAT_MSG_CHAT_NO AND A.CHAT_LIST_NO = B.CHAT_LIST_NO AND A.CHAT_LIST_NO=F.CHAT_USER_CHAT_NO AND A.CHAT_LIST_BOARD_TYPE='S' ORDER BY A.CHAT_LIST_CREATED_AT DESC

SELECT CHAT_MSG_USER_ID,CHAT_MSG_TXT,CHAT_MSG_CREATED_AT FROM (SELECT CHAT_MSG_USER_ID, CHAT_MSG_TXT, DECODE(TO_CHAR(CHAT_MSG_CREATED_AT,'YYYY/MM/DD'),TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD'), DECODE(TO_CHAR(CHAT_MSG_CREATED_AT,'am'),'오전', TO_CHAR(CHAT_MSG_CREATED_AT,'"오전" HH24:MI | "오늘"'), TO_CHAR(CHAT_MSG_CREATED_AT,'"오후" HH24:MI | "오늘"') ), DECODE(TO_CHAR(CHAT_MSG_CREATED_AT,'am'),'오전', TO_CHAR(CHAT_MSG_CREATED_AT,'"오전" HH24:MI | YYYY/MM/DD'), TO_CHAR(CHAT_MSG_CREATED_AT,'"오후" HH24:MI | YYYY/MM/DD') ) ) AS CHAT_MSG_CREATED_AT FROM CHAT_MSG A WHERE CHAT_MSG_CHAT_NO=#{chat_msg_chat_no} ORDER BY A.CHAT_MSG_CREATED_AT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM<=20
SELECT * FROM CHAT_USER A,MEMBER B WHERE A.CHAT_USER_ID=B.MEMBERID AND CHAT_USER_CHAT_NO=#{chat_user_chat_no}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHAT_USER A, CHAT_LIST B WHERE A.CHAT_USER_CHAT_NO=B.CHAT_LIST_NO AND A.CHAT_USER_ID= #{memberid} AND B.CHAT_LIST_BOARD_TYPE='S'
SELECT * FROM CHAT_LIST A, CHAT_USER B WHERE A.CHAT_LIST_NO = B.CHAT_USER_CHAT_NO AND B.CHAT_USER_KING_YN='Y' AND B.CHAT_USER_ID=#{chat_user_id} AND A.CHAT_LIST_BOARD_TYPE='S'
